hero.title: Maman Jeanne
hero.subtitle: Discover the authenticity of traditional Haitian Creole and Congolese cuisine, simmered with love and passion for three generations.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: At Chez Maman Jeanne, we offer you the rich and varied flavors of African Congolese and Haitian Creole cuisine. Our menu is a fusion of traditional dishes, prepared with authentic ingredients and seasoned with love, just like home.
about.description2: Whether you crave the bold spices of Congo or the vibrant flavors of Haiti, you'll find a home-cooked meal that satisfies your soul. Come discover a warm and welcoming atmosphere, where each dish tells a story of heritage and heart.
about.description3: Join us for an unforgettable culinary journey.
about.quote: Each dish tells a story of heritage and heart

tribute.title: In Honor of Maman Jeanne
tribute.paragraph1: It all began with the loving hands of Maman Jeanne, who passed down to us not only her secret recipes, but also her passion for authentic cuisine. Every dish we serve carries the essence of her love and tradition.
tribute.paragraph2: Her teachings still resonate in our kitchen today. She taught us that food is not just a meal, but a way to bring families together, preserve our culture, and share our heritage with the world.
tribute.quote: The best spice in every dish is the love you put into it
tribute.paragraph3: Today, in her honor, we continue to prepare each meal with the same passion and respect for traditions that she instilled in us. Her spirit lives through every flavor, every aroma, and every smile we share with our customers.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What our customers think of us on different platforms
reviews.uberEatsReview: Excellent Haitian cuisine, fast service and generous portions!
reviews.doorDashReview: Good food, on-time delivery. Worth trying!
reviews.montrealReview: Authenticity and exceptional flavors in the heart of Montreal!
reviews.orderNow: Order now and discover why our customers love us!

location.title: Where to Find Us
location.subtitle: Come discover the warm atmosphere of our restaurant and savor our authentic dishes in a friendly setting.

footer.description: Discover the authenticity of Haitian and Congolese cuisine in the heart of Montreal. Traditional flavors prepared with passion for generations.
footer.rights: ¬© 2024 Chez Maman Jeanne. All rights reserved.

gallery.title: Our Story in Pictures
gallery.subtitle: Discover the evolution of our restaurant through the years, from our humble beginnings to today

founding.title: The Beginning
founding.description: Maman Jeanne opens the doors of her first restaurant with a simple vision: to share the love of traditional Haitian and Congolese cuisine with her community.

tradition.title: The Traditions
tradition.description: The first family recipes are introduced to the menu, passed down from generation to generation to preserve the authenticity of our flavors.

specialties.title: Our Specialties
specialties.description: Griot de Porc becomes our signature dish, prepared according to Maman Jeanne's secret recipe that has won over Montreal's heart.

expansion.title: The Expansion
expansion.description: Our menu expands with new traditional dishes, creating a unique fusion between Haitian and Congolese flavors.

fusion.title: Culinary Fusion
fusion.description: We innovate by combining traditional culinary techniques with local ingredients, creating unique dishes.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Our restaurant receives its first local distinctions and becomes a must-visit place for African cuisine in Montreal.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continue to innovate while respecting our roots, introducing new flavors while preserving authenticity.

today.title: Today
today.description: Three generations later, we continue to serve with passion the flavors that made our success, keeping Maman Jeanne's spirit alive.

inStoreOrder.title: In-Store Order
inStoreOrder.subtitle: Create a new order for pickup or dine-in
inStoreOrder.orderSuccess: Order successfully placed! We'll prepare it for you.
